title: UCC Data Mining - Merchant Cash Advance
snippet:
Hello Data Specialist, My company specializes in working capital for small businesses nationwide. We are looking for experienced in UCC Data Mining for the Merchant Cash Advance & Small Business Loans Industry. We are looking for the latest (Last 120 Days) filed UCC's from all 50 States (Except CA and OR) in the USA. We are looking to use these as leads to call using our dialer. 

Furthermore, we need this data to be divided into the SIC codes specific for that industry. If this is something you enjoy doing and may help us, please respond with previous experience and your quote. Thank you 

Please respond with previous experience and price quote.
